entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , St. John's
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:06 PM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 0.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. John's Int'l Airport 6:10 PM NST Sunday 15 January 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 0.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 4.0 km
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 0.2°C
Wind: NE 31 km/h gust 43 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain with risk of freezing rain. Fog patches dissipating early this evening. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northeast 40 gusting to 60 this evening. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Showers or drizzle. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Showers or drizzle. Fog patches developing near noon. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Temperature rising to 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of rain mixed with drizzle. Fog. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to 7 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 15 January 2023
